content: This page is not very clear what parameters are required in dynamic registration.
Well, all we say is "we encourage FHIR service implementers to consider using theÂ OAuth 2.0 Dynamic Client Registration Protocol." so it's not like we're really trying...
We don't mention any parameters at all.
Do you know if any server support that right now?
Some generic OAuth servers do, like MITREid -- though I'm not sure anyone has implemented this alongside the SMART bulk Data spec
